notes: Beautifully renovated modern apartment with high-end finishes including recessed lighting, central AC, sleek kitchen with island bar, and quality furniture. Very clean and bright with good natural light from large windows. For baby safety: no visible stairs, floor-to-ceiling windows appear to have balcony access that would need childproofing; bar stools and glass coffee table are potential hazards that can be addressed with baby-proofing.
